about_the_game:
The Mister Versatile Original Sound Track includes almost 40 exclusive tracks including all the game songs and a voice actor blooper reel! If you don't know how to access DLCs, read the instructions below the track list.

1. Bloopers
2. Action
3. Captain Crush Theme
4. Car Chase (By Chris Escalante)
5. Chihuahua Theme
6. Clap
7. Conversation
8. Dancing Spider
9. Dark Hiphop
10. Dark Piano
11. Dark Trombones
12. Driller Theme
13. Fantasy
14. Feelings
15. Funky
16. Heavy Spider
17. Iceskating Spider
18. Intimacy
19. Investigate
20. Jake Theme
21. Jungle Funk
22. Lascivion Theme
23. Main Menu
24. Mysterious
25. Random Bell
26. Rhythm is Going to Get You
27. Sad
28. Saturday Morning Cartoons
29. Sexy Tams
30. So Drama
31. Something Comfortable
32. Superhero
33. Suspense
34. Syd Theme
35. Tension
36. The City
37. Thinking
38. Thriller
39. Victory

Once you purchase and install/download the Sound Track in the DLC list of Mister Versatile in your Steam Library, you can find the files for it in your Local Files. Right-click the name of the game (Mister Versatile) from the list of games in your Steam Engine library, click Properties, go to the Local Files tab, then click Browse Local Files. You'll find the sound track in this folder.

content_descriptors.notes: Sexual moaning and swears in blooper reel.
